description: Audit pipeline compliance rules for audit skill

rules.description: All Task calls must use fully qualified subagent_type with 'project-mapper:' prefix (e.g., 'project-mapper:auditor', not 'auditor')
Must spawn exactly 1 project-mapper:auditor Task and exactly 1 project-mapper:analyzer Task, sequentially (auditor first, then analyzer). No other subagent Tasks allowed from the main context.
Must not directly scan code using Glob, Read, or Grep tools for analysis purposes. All code analysis must be delegated to the auditor and analyzer subagents.
Findings must be displayed grouped by priority: High Priority, Medium Priority, Low Priority sections with item counts.
Must not use Write tool. Only Edit tool is allowed for appending findings to backlog.md.
